articles.author: Mehul Lakhanpal
articles.description:
üìä What is a Tracking Pixel?
A tracking pixel is a tiny HTML code snippet that loads when someone visits a website or opens an email.
It helps marketers:
‚úÖ Track user behavior
‚úÖ Measure conversions
‚úÖ Analyze campaign performance
‚úÖ Enable retargeting
Used in web analytics, email marketing, and online ads ‚Äî it's a powerful tool for data-driven growth.
üîó Learn more: ryte.com/wiki/Tracking_Pixel
articles.title: What are tracking pixels and how do they work?

articles.author: The TechPreneur
articles.description:
No one is really for it. We all know it's not the best way to work. It‚Äôs that moment you stop thinking and just let the AI take over.
Your expertise can take a hit.
i‚Äôve felt it myself. When i vibe-code too much, i start to trust my own knowledge less. Even if i know the answer, i find myself checking with an AI.
it's like when i wanted to get stronger at the gym. i had to go and actually lift the weights, not just read about lifting theory. If you let the AI do all the lifting, you don‚Äôt build any muscle.
AI agents are getting better.
New tools are coming that can write and fix code by themselves. This means we'll be looking at the actual code less and less.
And let's be honest, chat is not a great way to talk to an AI for coding. Startups are already building better ways for us to work with them.
But AI will not replace you.
An AI can't come up with a new idea on its own. It needs a prompt.
Think about talking to a customer. They might forget a key detail because to them, it's obvious. It‚Äôs our job to figure that out and translate it into formal, structured code. The same thing happens when we prompt an AI, and the same thing would happen if an AI prompted itself. That‚Äôs where we, as developers, come in.
What this all means for developers.
It's going to be less about how many programming languages you know by heart. It's going to be more about how well you understand what your clients and customers actually need.
So, if you're already in IT, start playing with these new AI tools. Get a feel for them.
And if you're thinking about getting into IT, this is a great time to start. The barrier to entry is changing.
For a good place to start learning, check out my YouTube channel. The link is in my bio.
articles.title: Let's talk about vibe coding.

Are you ready to discover how features like stable Signals, the groundbreaking push towards Zoneless change detection, and a suite of tooling enhancements will make your Angular development journey more intuitive, efficient, and downright enjoyable? By the end of this article, you'll not only have a clear understandin‚Ä¶
articles.title: Stop What You're Doing: Angular 20's New Superpowers Will Change How You Code¬†Forever

articles.author: Benji üçô
articles.description:
Whenever I want to describe an image of a container image I pushed on AWS ECR i would see a JSON similar to below:
aws ecr describe-images --repository-name <my-repo> --region <my-region> --query 'sort_by(imageDetails,&imagePushedAt)[-1]'

{
    "registryId": "*****",
    "repositoryName": "*******************",
    "imageDigest": "sha256:***************************************",
    "imageTags": [
        "****"
    ],
    "imageSizeInBytes": **********,
    "imagePushedAt": "***********************",
    "imageManifestMediaType": "***********************************************",
    "artifactMediaType": "***********************************************"
}

but with the suffix --output table you can get a (IMO) much better layout
aws ecr describe-images --repository-name <my-repo> --regio‚Ä¶
articles.title: TIL you can output `aws ecr describe-images` as a table

articles.author: jenny
articles.description:
Supabase is an open-source backend-as-a-service that provides a PostgreSQL database, authentication, and storage services. Microsoft Power BI is a powerful business analytics tool that enables users to visualize and share insights from their data. Connecting Supabase to Power BI allows you to create dynamic dashboards and reports based on your Supabase data.
‚úÖ Prerequisites
A Supabase project
Microsoft Power BI Desktop
Supabase SSL certificate downloaded1. 
üîë Get Your Supabase Connection Details
Host: Use the Session Pooler URL (e.g. aws-0-xyz.pooler.supabase.co)
Port: 5432
Database:typically postgres
User: typically postgres.project-ref
Password:xxxxxxxx
Download the .crt file from the SSL Configuration section.

üõ°Ô∏è Please note: Supabase's Direct Connection uses IPv6 by default, if your‚Ä¶
articles.title: How to connect Supabase to Microsoft Power BI

articles.author: Gaming News
articles.description:
TL;DR: Mark Rubin, the ex-Call of Duty lead who helmed Ubisoft‚Äôs free-to-play shooter XDefiant, has quietly exited the games industry after the title shut down on June 3, 2025. Despite record-fast early player acquisition, the game never reached critical mass due to ‚Äúvery little marketing,‚Äù crippling tech debt in the Snowdrop engine, and unsolvable netcode issues that tanked multiplayer reliability.
Rubin praised his team‚Äôs ‚Äúfun, terrific‚Äù maps and teased unrealized Season 4 features, but admitted they lacked the resources to fix fundamental engine flaws. He now plans to spend more time with family‚Äîwhile hoping someone else picks up the flag to push modern multiplayer forward without resorting to microtransaction overload and punishing skill-based matchmaking.
articles.title: XDefiant and former CoD lead quits the games industry after Ubisoft killed their free-to-play shooter

articles.author: Gaming News
articles.description:
Swedish business paper Dagens Industri revealed that Tencent quietly scooped up a 15.75 % stake in Helldivers 2 developer Arrowhead Game Studios back in July 2024, paying about $83 million and valuing the Stockholm studio at roughly SEK 5.1 billion (~$532 million). Arrowhead rode Helldivers 2‚Äôs success‚Äî12 million copies sold in three months, fastest-selling PlayStation Studios title‚Äîto chalk up SEK 959 million (~$100 million) in profit (SEK 729 million operating profit) last year.


Arrowhead‚Äôs co-founder Johan Pilestedt calls the Chinese player base ‚Äúthe holy grail,‚Äù and sees Tencent‚Äôs backing as massive economic leverage. Details on how deeply Tencent will be involved remain sketchy‚ÄîArrowhead insists its next game will be 100 % self-funded and not a PlayStation publishing deal‚Äîbut the studio‚Äôs already got a passionate Chinese community (even China‚Äôs U.S. embassy tweeted about their in-game heroics).
articles.title: Tencent buys 15.75% stake in Helldivers 2 dev Arrowhead
